name: Gunsplosion Builder-O
description:
An action platformer with a level creator. 

Controls

movement - W,A,S,D 

aim shooting - arrow keys 

swap weapons - E, Q

interact with pickup - R 

Jump - Space

shift - speed booster

Credits

Weapon system - thedarkmagi

player systems - David R Mincer

Level Editor - Widdiful

Enemies - TraceOfCyan

Artwork by DENZI denzi.diary@gmail.com
